scripts.build: npm run build:lint && npm run cleandocs && npm run generate && npm run build:tsc && npm run build:bundle && npm run buildscss && npm run build:csscopy && npm run build:htmlcopy && npm run build:htmlprodfixes && npm run build:assetscopy && npm run clean:remove-tsc-dist
scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run devbuild && concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:grunt" "npm run dev:servehtml"
scripts.devbuild: npm run devbuild:tsc && npm run devbuild:bundle && npm run buildscss
scripts.clean: npm run clean:css && npm run clean:js && npm run clean:remove-tsc-dist && npm run clean:bengular-generated
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run devbuild && npm run generate && npm run clean && echo TEST SUCCESSFUL
